Node.definition: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= town, precise location unknown; ◄ territory of Simeon (שִׁמְעֹון) ► belonged to Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) and given to David (דָּוִד) before he moved to Hebron (חֶבְרֹון) where he was made king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
= causative action by which humans put other humans in a position by which they can no longer move at will
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ son of Abiel (אֲבִיאֵל) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► father of king Saul (שָׁאוּל)
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans ► in order to make their life, work, task or situation easier
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country
exact meaning uncertain; possibly: = state in which a person is equipped with a weapon, especially a bow and arrows
= a strong but flexible piece of wood to which a string is attached for the firing of arrows, ► used for hunting or as weapon of war

Node.gloss: to do (something) with the right hand
Node.definition: = action by which humans perform an action with the right hand

Node.gloss: to do (something) with the left hand
Node.definition: = action by which humans perform an action with the left (שְׂמֹאל) hand

= an object ◄ of stone, ► usually found in nature and used for throwing, building crude constructions; stones with a particular shape are sometimes used as a memorial or religious symbol; ≈ regarded as extremely common, easily available, but also as strong, hard, and unflexible

= pointed missile, shot from a bow; slender and straight in shape and moving swiftly; ◄ made out of wood and/or iron; ► mainly used for hunting, in warfare, and occasionally for divination; ≈ symbol of aggression, affliction, and punishment
= a strong but flexible piece of wood to which a string is attached for the firing of arrows, ► used for hunting or as weapon of war
= member of same family, clan, tribe, or ethnic group
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
= man; ◄ tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= man; ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ◄ tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant of Gibeah (גִּבְעָה) a town in the territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= man; ◄ son of Azmaveth (עַזְמָוֶת) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption|= man; ► father of Jeziel (יְזִיאֵל) and Pelet (פֶּלֶט) warriors; time of David (דָּוִד)
= man; ◄ tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► one of the ambidextrous warriors related to king Saul (שָׁאוּל)
= man; ◄ from Anathoth (עַנְּתֹתִי) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant of Anatoth (עֲנָתֹות)
= man; ◄ from Gibeon (גִּבְעֹונִי) ► warrior; tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) time of king David (דָּוִד)
= inhabitant of Gibeon (גִּבְעֹון) a town in the territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= state in which a countable entity is thirty in number
= state in which a countable entity is thirty in number
= man; ► various warriors; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= man; ◄ tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)

= inhabitant of Gederah (גְּדֵרָה)

= man; ◄ tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= man; ◄ tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= man; ► warrior; time of David (דָּוִד)
= descendant of Hariph
= man; ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= man; ► warrior; time of David (דָּוִד)
= man; ◄ tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= man; ◄ tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= man, also known as Josheb Basshebeth (יֹשֵׁב בַּשֶּׁבֶת) ◄ son of Zabdiel (זַבְדִּיאֵל) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= descendant of Korah (קֹרַח) ◄ tribe of Levi (לֵוִי) ► gatekeepers and responsible for other temple services
= man; ◄ tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= man; ◄ son of Jeroham (יְרֹחָם) from Gedor (גְּדֹר) ► a warrior during the time of King David (דָּוִד)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man; ► father of warriors; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= town; ◄ territory of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן)
= member of tribe of Gad (גָּד)

Node.gloss: to separate oneself|to defect|to sequester oneself
Node.definition: = action by which humans disassociate themselves from a group of people
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= area shaped and located in such a way that it is hard to access and can be easily defended against enemies; ◄ this can be a natural stronghold in the mountains (e.g. caves) or a construction erected by humans in populated areas; ≈ often associated with security and sometimes used as an epithet for leaders or deities that are considered providers of security
= area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= relatively large group of people, usually with centralized leadership; ► assembled for a common purpose, such as warfare or a journey
literally: a person of battle; hence: = a person that is of age and physically able to bear arms

= a large, long, oblong object, about the height of a man, made of wood, metal, leather stretched over wood, or even plaited strips of wood or reeds, and used to protect the entire body against the weapons of the opponent; certain officers made use of shield bearers to carry it for them when they were not using it
= a long, straight rod, usually made of wood, with a sharp iron (בַּרְזֶל) head or point; used for piercing by thrusting; its length varied from the height of a man to much longer

= the largest of the great cats, often being about 2.8 meters from nose to tip of tail, standing as high as 1 meter (3 feet 3 inches) at the shoulder; pale yellowish brown in color; around the neck and shoulders of adult males grows a mane that is darker than the rest of their fur; ◄ Panthera leo; ► unclean animal; ≈ associated with aggression, fearlessness, and respect

see צְבִי (צְבִי)|= small to medium sized plain antelope, inhabiting savannah plains and semideserts, reddish brown in color with almost white underparts, and small horns (with exception of female impala); long legged, graceful, and an expert jumper; lives in small herds; the female is sexually active at one year; high rate of reproduction; ◄ |iGazella dorcas|i* or |iGazella arabica|i*; ► clean and can therefore be eaten; ≈ associated with speed, grace, beauty, female sexuality, male virility, and fertility
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
= action by which humans or animals move quickly
= a warrior and leader from the tribe of Gad (גָּד) during the time of David (דָּוִד)
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
= man; ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= state in which a countable entity is the second in a range
= man; ◄ tribe of Gad (גָּד) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= state in which a countable entity is the third in a range

= state in which a countable entity is the fourth in a range

= state in which a countable entity is the fifth in a range
= man; ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= state in which a countable entity is the sixth in a range
= various men; ► warriors; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= state in which a countable entity is the seventh in a range
= man; ◄ Gadite (גָּדִי) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= man; ◄ tribe of Gad (גָּד) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= state in which a countable entity is the ninth in a range
= man; ► various warriors; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= man; ► warrior; tribe of Gad (גָּד) time of king David (דָּוִד)
= state in which a countable object is eleven or the eleventh in number
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ seventh son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and first son of Zilpah (זִלְפָּה) slave of Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
= relatively large group of people, usually with centralized leadership; ► assembled for a common purpose, such as warfare or a journey
= state in which a countable entity is one in number
= state in which a countable entity is one hundred in number
= state in which humans are of relatively low esteem
= state in which a human being or deity has an elevated status, as a result of their authority, rank, wealth, or wisdom
= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= river; ◄ flowing from Mount Hermon (חֶרְמֹון) in a southerly direction through the Sea of Galilee (כִּנֶּרֶת) into the Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח)
= period of time, measured by a complete cycle in the phases of the moon
= state in which a countable entity is the first or the previous in a range
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= action by which objects enter a certain location or container, or cover a certain surface to the extent that little or no space is left
= the land alongside a river

Node.gloss: to put to flight|to chase away
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans cause other humans or animals to move to another place in haste, ◄ usually by threatening them with violence

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
literally: the rising (of the sun): = a cardinal direction indicating the direction of the rising sun
literally: sunset; hence: = a cardinal direction indicating the direction towards the setting of the sun
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption
= man (called Ben Oni (בֶּן־אֹונִי) by his mother), tribe, and territory; ◄ twelfth and last son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל) which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of Solomon (שְׁלֹמֹה) and, after the exile, a separate administrative district
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y

= area shaped and located in such a way that it is hard to access and can be easily defended against enemies; ◄ this can be a natural stronghold in the mountains (e.g. caves) or a construction erected by humans in populated areas; ≈ often associated with security and sometimes used as an epithet for leaders or deities that are considered providers of security
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

Node.gloss: to go out|to come out|to go away|to leave|to depart
Node.definition: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans ► in order to make their life, work, task or situation easier
literally: heart; hence: = the seat of knowledge, human reasoning, planning, intelligence, skill, affection and hatred, desire and satisfaction, humility and pride, courage and fear, joy and grief
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event
= marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place
= action by which humans cause other humans to believe something that is not true; ► the result can be dangerous or destructive to what was once a trusting relationship
primarily used in poetry: = person that opposes other people and so is a cause of distress to others
= to behave aggressively towards someone with which one has a relationship; ► usually in order to enrich oneself in one way or another

literally: palm of the hand, but used in a figurative sense with the focus on the activities that are performed with one's hands; = someone's actions, whether or not performed with one's hands, for which one is personally responsible

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= indirect male progenitor
literally: to judge; hence: = action by which humans or deities inflict a penalty on others as retribution for what they have done

= an invisible being that is in a direct relation to and under control of God and one of his manifestation, often described as a substance that can be poured out, ► through whom the universe is created and animated; it can manifest itself as an invisible force equipping humans with wisdom, skill, and strength for specific tasks; it can also manifest itself as a movement of air through the bodies of animate creatures (breath) or through nature (wind)
literally: to clothe; hence: = action by which the Spirit of YHWH takes full possession of a human being and fills that person with willingness, courage and gives them the right words to speak

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ► warrior; time of David (דָּוִד)
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= direct or indirect human offspring, either male or indeterminate, either biologically or through adoption|= man; ◄ son of Obed (עֹובֵד) tribe of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► father of David (דָּוִד)
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans ► in order to make their life, work, task or situation easier
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans ► in order to make their life, work, task or situation easier
plural with singular meaning: = generic term for a supernatural being, worshiped by individuals or entire nations
= action by which humans receive other humans in their company
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
literally: head; hence: = the person in leadership of a group of people, or, by extension, the most important object among a set of objects

= a group of armed humans equipped for fighting on land, whose main purpose it is to execute swift attacks and loot and plunder as much as they can; sometimes also used to denote a unit of a more regular army
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of Joseph (יֹוסֵף) ► founder of tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)
literally: to fall; hence: = action by which humans leave the group to which they belong and join another group, which is often seen as the enemy
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans ► in order to make their life, work, task or situation easier

Node.gloss: to send away|to divorce|to expel|to remove|to cast out
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities force (other) humans to go away from a certain location and/or position; ◄ due to a lack of affection, as punishment, or for other reasons
= person in charge of a Philistine city
= inhabitant of Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) considered to have come from Kaphtor (כַּפְתֹּור)

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities
literally: to fall; hence: = action by which humans leave the group to which they belong and join another group, which is often seen as the enemy
= man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer
= man; ◄ son of Kish (קִישׁ) tribe of Benjamin (בִּנְיָמִן) ► first king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= action by which humans, deities, or animals move forward, usually towards a specific destination

= town, precise location unknown; ◄ territory of Simeon (שִׁמְעֹון) ► belonged to Philistia (פְּלֶשֶׁת) and given to David (דָּוִד) before he moved to Hebron (חֶבְרֹון) where he was made king of Judah (יְהוּדָה)
literally: to fall; hence: = action by which humans leave the group to which they belong and join another group, which is often seen as the enemy

= man; ◄ tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) ► warrior; time of king David (דָּוִד)
= men; ◄ tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) ► warriors; time of king David (דָּוִד)

= man; ► warrior; ◄ tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה) time of David (דָּוִד)

= pertaining to being a thousand in number or to happening a thousand times
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of Joseph (יֹוסֵף) ► founder of tribe of Manasseh (מְנַשֶּׁה)
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans ► in order to make their life, work, task or situation easier
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)

= a group of armed humans equipped for fighting on land, whose main purpose it is to execute swift attacks and loot and plunder as much as they can; sometimes also used to denote a unit of a more regular army
= a human being, animal, or supernatural being who is renowned for his characteristics, such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof

= state in which a human being, animal, or deity is deemed worthy of respect because of characteristics such as physical strength, power, bravery, skill, wealth, good character, or a combination thereof
= someone in a position of authority in an army, at a royal court, of a town, within a family, among priests, or elsewhere
= relatively large group of people, usually with centralized leadership; ► assembled for a common purpose, such as warfare or a journey
literally: to the time of day at day; hence: = a reference to subsequent days over a longer stretch of time

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine

= a basic unit of time, including evening (עֶרֶב) and morning (בֹּקֶר) seven days make a week (שְׁבוּעָה) sometimes used in a figurative sense referring to a limited period of time, which may be shorter or slightly longer than a single day; the context often makes it difficult to determine
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= action by which humans or deities provide assistance or support to (other) humans ► in order to make their life, work, task or situation easier
particle linking an event to an object; = relation indicating that event X results in the existence of object Y
literally: a camp; hence: = a relatively large group of people, such as nomads or soldiers, moving from one camping place to another
= state in which an animate or inanimate object is relatively large in size
literally: a camp; hence: = a relatively large group of people, such as nomads or soldiers, moving from one camping place to another
plural with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers
= the quantity of a number of objects or the frequency of a number of events
literally: head; hence: = a sub division of a larger unit that is divided into multiple parts
= action by which humans make themselves strong and powerful by putting on armor
= state of serving as a soldier in active combat
= man; ◄ son of Jesse (יִשַׁי) ► king of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= town, formerly known as Kiriath Arba (קִרְיַת אַרְבַּע) ◄ territory of Judah (יְהוּדָה) ► assigned to clan of Aaron (אַהֲרֹן) tribe of Levi (לֵוִי)
literally: to cause to go around; hence: = causative action by which humans cause other humans to engage with a certain opportunity

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
particle linking an event to a point in space; = relation indicating that event X ends at point in space Y
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ ninth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and fifth son of Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ tenth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and sixth son of Leah (לֵאָה) ► founder of tribe of Israel
= man, tribe, and territory; ◄ sixth son of Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and second son of Bilhah (בִּלְהָה) slave of Rachel (רָחֵל) ► founder of tribe of Israel (יִשְׂרָאֵל)
= a staple food ◄ made from a dough of water and either wheat or barley then baked; ► together with water considered the very basis of life, often used to refer to food in general

= domestic animal belonging to the same family as the horse, but smaller and with longer ears; it can have variety of colors from dark brown, through light brown to gray and occasionally white; ◄ |iEquus Asinus africanus;|i* ► used to ride on, carry loads, or do other work; ≈ highly regarded; for male see עַיִר (עַיִר) female see אָתֹון (אָתֹון)

= large quadruped mammal, which may reach a height of 2 m. or more; dromedaries are bigger and a uniform light fawn color; bactrians are darker; they are suited to life in desert areas, store excess food in their humps, can go without water for long periods, and can make long journeys through dry areas; ◄ Camelus dromedarius and Camelus bactrianus; ► they are used for riding and for carrying heavy loads and pulling carts; their hair is woven into cloth used for making tents or outer robes; their milk is used as food and drink; ≈ they are a symbol of wealth and commerce, but unclean and not to be eaten

= male or female offspring of a male donkey and a female horse (or, but less common, a male horse and a female donkey); stronger than a donkey and more resistant to diseases than horses and donkeys; infertile; usually dark brown in color; has bigger ears than the parent horse; ► used for riding and as pack animals; ≈ associated with a lack of understanding

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth
= any nutritious substance that people or animals eat or drink ► in order to maintain life and growth
= flour made from ground grain kernels, ► used for baking bread, as ingredient for food, and as grain offering
= cake; ◄ made of pressed dried figs; ► used as food and occasionally as medical treatment
= bunch of grapes dried for preservation; ► a food delicacy and source of sugar

= dark red alcoholic liquid; ◄ made out of grapes through the process of fermentation; ► used as beverage, though to be avoided by Nazirites, and by priests when on duty; ≈ associated with joy and well being, but also with drunkenness and foolishness; used as metaphor for anger, aggressive behavior, and sex

= high quality oil (שֶׁמֶן) ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth

= group of small domestic animals traveling and feeding together; ◄ consisting of sheep and goats; ► hair or wool shorn for weaving into cloth; female milked for food; may be killed and eaten for meat; used as sacrificial animal; ≈ associated with large quantities and also with God's people, who are often seen as a flock with God as their shepherd
= state in which humans feel and show great joy

= man, also known as Jacob (יַעֲקֹב) and Jeshurun (יְשֻׁרוּן) including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of Isaac (יִצְחָק) and Rebekah (רִבְקָה) brother of Esau (עֵשָׂו) and ► father of twelve sons after whom the tribes of Israel were named and one daughter
